Wide and Beautiful

Enigmatic theme is designed to bring out the best in you. It does this with the notion of segments which span full width and lets you "paint" it any way you like with backgrounds images, patterns, wide sliders etc.

Fast and Easy

While being flexible, Enigmatic also offers a lot of help along the way. The content can easily be snapped to a 1140px grid, variety of content created with the help of 100+ shortcodes and easy styling options available to you.

Showcase Your Work

Whether you operate a service/agency or have a product, Enigmatic helps you create a site that breaks the mold and catches attention of your clients/customers by helping to create long yet beautiful pages with several unique segments.

Easy Customization

Enigmatic comes with 250+ options to help configure each and every element of your page. That distinct look you always crave for need not be a job of tweaking lengthy stylesheet code and hoping things will work.
